name: Neon Dan
storyline: Dan is the life of the party, and needs a refill of his favorite Soda, Neon. He goes out to grab some but finds some portals snatched up the drinks. Being one to do anything for his carbonated goodness he hops in to grab his soda and skedaddle.
summary: I built this in Scratch in Highscool during 2021 for my final project, and wanted my friends to be able to truly show off their love for it.
